knimeNode.name: Wilcoxon Signed-Rank
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates Wilcoxon signed-rank statistics for dependend groups.

fullDescription.intro: Calculates the Wilcoxon signed-rank statistics for dependent groups. The static w is calculated by building the difference between the two values of a pair and ranking them. The output will be the sum of ranks of positive differences (w+) and the sum of ranks of negative differences (w-) and the measures derived from that.
fullDescription.option: You can define the test column pairs here. Every pair is used to perform a Wilcoxon signed-rank test separately.
